overview: Ryan Jordan can't help but be attracted to Chris Blades when he lays eyes on him at his family reunion. Chris's outfit has Ryan believing the hottie is a cater waiter, but he gets pretty surprised when he realizes his new crush is his step-cousin. It is Thanksgiving, and there is nothing more traditional than spending time with the family. But this year, cousins Dante Colle and Ryan Jordan want to spice things up with forbidden love and hardcore sex. Dakota Payne hasn't visited his step-cousin, Jack Hunter, in quite some time. As Jack shows Dakota where he'll be staying, Dakota takes this opportunity to convince Jack to re-live some of their memories together. Like the memory of them having hot steamy sex. Enjoy family fun in Stuffing My Cousin for Thanksgiving.
title: Stuffing My Cousin for Thanksgiving
